main.name: Almir Bećirović
main.description: I'm very enthusiastic person, constantly looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.
main.bio: As web developer my goal is to leave a positive mark on Bosnia and Herzegovina digital landscape. I primarily use Node.js for backend development, but I also have some experience with Django and Spring Boot. As of now I only used React for frontend development.
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to contact me.

testimonials.text: The best man is who has the most benefits for others

Almir's dedication to his craft is truly commendable. He approaches every challenge with a combination of creativity and analytical thinking. His problem-solving skills are remarkable and he never shies away from problems and issues. I have no doubt Almir will thrive in the world of programming and make significant contribution to any project he takes on.
